data.title: Installation eQual with Docker
data.description:
Chapter Summary: Installing Docker

Overview:

This chapter provides a step-by-step guide to installing Docker on both Windows and Linux systems, ensuring that you have the necessary environment set up to use the eQual framework and Symbiose ERP effectively.

On Windows:

  1. Install Windows HyperV
  2. Install WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux)
  3. Install WSL 2
  4. Install a Linux Distribution
  5. Install Docker Desktop

On Linux:

  • Ubuntu / Debian: Instructions for installing Docker on these distributions.
  • Fedora: Steps to set up Docker on Fedora.
  • CentOS: Guide for installing Docker on CentOS.

This chapter ensures you have a solid foundation for running Docker, which is essential for developing and deploying applications using the eQual framework and Symbiose ERP.
